channel.title: Analytics on Ghezae Fisseha

item.title: What is Cohort Analysis?
item.description: First, let's begin by defining what cohort mean. The word cohort is derived from Latin cohors meaning an enclosure or enclosed group. In digital analytics context it means a group of customers that share something in common. This refers to a groupo of users who have similar characteristics or experiences within a defined time-span. Therefore, cohort analysis is a type of behavioral analytics that breaks the dataset into groups before conducting analysis.
